lexUnit.name: smile.v

corpus.description: Wall Street Journal Texts from the PropBank Project
corpus.name: PropBank

document.description: Berlitz Where to Go in Hong Kong
document.name: WhereToHongKong

lexUnit.definition: COD: form one's features into a pleased, friendly, or amused expression, with the corners of the mouth turned up.

sentence.text: As they were leaving the producer paused and smiled at her .
The two telephones were removed from the table and Jo smiled at Lili .
She was still silently pondering this as he came back into the room and smiled across at his mother .
Jennifer , unsure if this comment was directed at her , smiled again and nodded , ` Yes please . "
She told him where Dyson and Bob were , and he nodded and smiled again , as if he had known already .
Edward saw that he was teased , and smiled .
Ranald was disappointed , but Luch smiled in relief .
She smiled at the girl , who smiled back .
She finished her drink , smiling at him over the rim of the cup .
Some showed neatly dressed Annamese families smiling from the doorways of houses set in small gardens beside groves of rubber trees .
GRAHAM GOOCH , the man who dragged English Test cricket out of its stupor , smiles from the dust jacket , his face symbolically dripping sweat .
I sat in a corner looking at the Dutchmen who smiled surreptitiously from the platform .
A small black lady smiled indulgently from the opposite seat .
Tamar 's eyes met George 's and they smiled in mutual affection .
Forrest smiled in approval .
I smiled in assent .
When he sees us , he smiles in recognition .
He smiled in a benevolent sort of way when he said this .
After replacing the receiver she sat down on the edge of the coffee table and smiled to herself .
Lisa smiled to herself .
Will inclined his head , acknowledging her words , smiling to himself at the irony of the situation .
A schoolboy thought crossed Richard 's mind and he smiled to himself .
Julia smiled with gratitude .
Shiona smiled with sheer joy .
Instead she smiled with pioneer delight .
Jay never went to conferences , but as she accepted a lift with Lucy , he smiled with open pleasure .
She smiled with relief , thinking he was at last calling off his proposal .
He smiled with relief that she had changed the subject away from Richard Sharpe .
Then she opens her pretty red lips and smiles with pretty white teeth .
She smiled as Adam looked up quizzically .
He was smiling like a happy demon , almost tenderly .
I lean back in my seat , smiling ironically over the hedge from the little back garden that serves as a soul for the English .
She looked up and smiled dutifully through the tears .
He was smiling as the train drew out of the station , smiling and waving his hat as the band played ` Tipperary " .
He heard the surprise in her voice , and smiled a little at having so nearly caught her out .
His eyes flickered past her and he smiled faintly before turning back to her and loudly questioning the validity of the original invoice .
The senior partner smiled from behind his desk .
In earlier years , he may have smiled indulgently on seeing us and our makeshift tables with their colourless array of old books and goods .
He smiled absently on catching sight of me , and I wandered over and stood in the well of the Steinway .
She , naturally enough , smiled back .
She smiled back and turned to Peter .
She smiled back and nodded .
Molly smiled back , by no means certain if this was a conversation meant to be taken seriously .
She smiled , and the girl smiled back .
Jean smiled weakly back .
But he found the American rocking on his heels and smiling back at him engagingly , and the slow drawl of his address continued without pause .
Li Shai Tung smiled back at him .
He smiled back at Beruna , trying to silently communicate how proud he was , of both her and Paula , but her eyes fell angrily to her work .
Their eyes met for a moment and Guido smiled back at her , flooding her heart with foolish pleasure .
Shiona had smiled back at the fair-haired youth who had so recently become her brother .
Harry smiled down at her .
The tall soldier smiled down at him .
He stood behind her chair and smiled down into her upturned face .
He smiled down at her coldly .
Like a nun , or his sister , she sat holding his hand , smiling gently down at him .
Corbett walked over , arms folded , and smiled icily down at his inveterate enemy .
She smiled up at him wickedly .
Julia pushed the lank , greasy hair off her forehead and smiled up at him .
Tom Horrocks dropped his head , hands at his knees , groaning and smiling up at them .
Lucie plucked a stem of grass and chewed on it , smiling up at Gabriel with a conspiratorial wink .
Tuppe smiled up at Cornelius .
Her eyes smiled up at him , her mouth smiled up at him .
YOUNG Michael Portillo 's cherubic face smiled out sweetly from the television set .
His inability to explain makes him smile again .
The lipless mouth smiled again .
She was smiling brightly , but her eyes retained a solemnity that was strangely intimidating .
Marshall smiled contentedly as he said : ` We got him to confess to putting the knife in the pond . "
The prime minister was smiling indulgently .
She seemed to feel his scrutiny , for she looked up , smiling involuntarily .
She smiled nervously as she looked back at him and seemed about to say something , then , instead , leaned forward to kiss him .
Praying he could n't see her agonised blush , Leonora smiled shakily .
Luther looked deep into the boy 's eyes and smiled wickedly when he saw the truth lurking there .
He would smile and talk engagingly and hide his feelings .
Hlose smiled and they passed into the first reception room .
In spite of herself , Lisa smiled a wry smile .
Caroline forced her attention to the middle-aged couple , who smiled and greeted her in almost flawless English .
I felt the temblor begin and glanced at the table next to mine , smiled that guilty smile and we both mouthed the words , `` Earth-quake ! '' together .
Next to Chez Panisse a homeless couple , bundled into a blue sleeping bag , sat up , said , `` Good morning '' and then the woman smiled , said , `` Is n't it great just to be alive ? '' I agreed .

From the ferry terminals on Hong Kong Island you can escape to islands without cars or cares , where the local people smile `` hello '' and , if you 're lucky , point you to a secret beach for the ultimate in quality leisure time .
Holmes smiled and rubbed his hands .
I smiled on him , did my duty to his children , and bided my time .
Holmes smiled as he turned up an entry in his note-book .
